context_bundle.summary: Workflow state management for tracking task execution status, dependencies, results, and failures in multi-agent orchestration

onboarding.quick_start: Maintain workflow state with task statuses (pending, running, completed, failed), track dependencies, aggregate results
common_patterns: Task states: pending, running, completed, failed, skipped
Workflow state: {tasks, dependencies, results, currentStage, startTime}
State persistence: Write workflow state to shared/state/workflow-{id}.json
Progress tracking: Update task status atomically after each state transition
Result aggregation: Collect outputs from completed tasks
